concept.title: Project List
concept.shortdesc: The Project List pane displays the projects that are located in the current workspace folder.

conbody.p: This pane lists expanded projects (see ) with a folder icon next to them, and compressed projects with an orange arrow next to them.
Compressed projects may be expanded by clicking on them in the list, or by right-clicking (CTRL+click) and choosing Extract project from the context menu.
